modName: Apachii Hair for Suite Residents Light
summary:
This mod changes the hair styles of 13 of the 38 BBLS NPCs, (12 Females and 1 male)
These changes are due to the fact that not all Apachii hairs have the same performance characteristics.
Use of this mod should result in a minimum of +10 FPS inside BBLS
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=yellow]WARNING[/color][/size][b][color=yellow],
Requires Skyrim version 1.8 or higher, [/color][/b][b][color=red]
Requires the Original "Apachii Hair for Suite Residents" V5.1 by Migal130[/color][/b],
Requires "ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full" + "ApachiiSkyHairFemale_[size=3][color=red]v_1_3"[/color][/size]

On a side note: If you like a mod, any mod, please come back to endorse it. Appreciation is a wonderfull motivator for modders.

Description:
This mod changes the hair styles of 13 of the 38 BBLS NPCs, (12 Females and 1 male)
These changes are due to the fact that not all Apachii hairs have the same performance characteristics.
While all Apachii hairs work great on your player character, they begin to add up to quite a system drain once they are used on entire rooms full of NPCs.
This mod simply insures that all the NPCs are using the lower poly hairs.
[size=3][color=yellow]Use of this mod should result in a minimum of +10 FPS inside BBLS[/color][/size]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/35817-1-1368044339.jpg[/img]

Planned additions, Coming Soon:
None


Change log:
V 1.0
Changed the Hair Styles of 13 of 38 BBLS NPCs
Initial release.


[size=3][color=red]Required Files:[/color][/size]
"Bathing Beauties or Beefcake - Luxury Suite" v5.0 by Migal130 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427[/url]
"Apachii Hair for Suite Residents" V5.1 by Migal130 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427[/url]

"ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full" by Apachii [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168[/url]
"ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_3-10168-1-3" by Apachii [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168[/url]


Installation:
Best is to install via NMM, (NOTE: this file dose NOT replace BBLSapachii.esp, Rather it should follow it in your order)
But for manual install;
Extract the Contents of the "Data" folder to, your skyrimData directory, (typically, C:ProgramfilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData)
Insure "BBLSapachii_Light.esp", Is turned on, and follows "BBLSapachii.esp" in your load order.


Uninstallation:
Best is to remove via NMM,
but for manual uninstall Remove;
BBLSapachii_Light.esp, from skyrimData
-If returning to Migals orginal "Apachii Hair for Suite Residents" V5.1 then reinstall that mod
--If returning to vanilla hair...
the folder skyrimDatameshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomBBLuxurySuite.esm
the folder skyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomBBLuxurySuite.esm


Known Issues:
There will be a slight "culture shock", for some users due to the changes of hair styles.


Incompatibilities:
None


Tools Used:
Creation Kit
TES5Edit


Permissions:
Nobody may upload my mod to any other sites, Repackage and claim it as their work, Profit from the use of "the mod in whole" or any of its assets, or restrict others from using ("their works" "based on my parts"). its just a game folks, lets keep it fun.


Credits:
Bethesda, for another fun game, and the meshes and textures I have reworked.
Migal130, for authoring a mod so great, and for all the help he provided me. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427[/url]
Apachii, for all the wonderfull hairs to choose from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168[/url]


Thanks To:
